title: How do I make Bing my lest primary search engine?
body: So basically since bing is useless anyway I was wondering how I could uninstall it or make it my non primary search engine.

replies.body:
Go into your home pages settings.
You should see a "Search" option.
Which is basically what search engine you use, just swap it to google.
You can also click and "Manage your search engines".
